.highlight .vg { color: #19177C } /* Name.Variable.Global */
.highlight .vi { color: #19177C } /* Name.Variable.Instance */
.highlight .vm { color: #19177C } /* Name.Variable.Magic */
.highlight .il { color: #666666 } /* Literal.Number.Integer.Long */</style><div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>O'REILLYの著書『<a href="https://www.oreilly.co.jp/books/9784873117782/">退屈なことはPythonにやらせよう</a>』で「正規表現」について記載されているところをまとめたノートです。</p>
<p>正規表現はCtrl-Fのテキスト検索でも気軽に使えて大変便利なので、以下のまとめはpython3での正規表現の初歩的な使い方をまとめたものですが、知らなかった人は見てみてもいいかもです。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="要点">要点<a class="anchor-link" href="#要点">¶</a></h2><h3 id="メタ文字">メタ文字<a class="anchor-link" href="#メタ文字">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li><code>?</code>は、直前のグループの0回か1回の出現にマッチする。（任意のマッチ）</li>
<li><code>*</code>は、直前のグループの0回以上の出現にマッチする。</li>
<li><code>+</code>は、直前のグループの1回以上の出現にマッチする。</li>
<li><code>{n}</code>は、直前のグループのn回の出現にマッチする。</li>
<li><code>{n,}</code>は、直前のグループのn回以上の出現にマッチする。</li>
<li><code>{,m}</code>は、直前のグループの0~m回の出現にマッチする。</li>
<li><code>{n,m}?</code>、<code>?</code>、<code>+?</code>は直前のグループの非貪欲マッチを行う。</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="文字集合">文字集合<a class="anchor-link" href="#文字集合">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li><code>\d</code>：0~9の数字</li>
<li><code>\D</code>：0~9の数字以外</li>
<li><code>\w</code>：文字、数字、下線（単語wordのw）</li>
<li><code>\W</code>：文字、数字、下線以外</li>
<li><code>\s</code>：スペース、タブ、改行（空白spaceのs）</li>
<li><code>\S</code>：スペース、タブ、改行以外</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="正規表現マッチのまとめ">正規表現マッチのまとめ<a class="anchor-link" href="#正規表現マッチのまとめ">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li><code>re</code>モジュール</li>
<li><code>re.compile()</code>関数</li>
<li><code>search()</code>メソッド</li>
<li><code>group()</code>メソッド</li>
<li><code>findall()</code>メソッド</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="実践">実践<a class="anchor-link" href="#実践">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="ch">#! python 3</span>
<span class="c1">#正規表現モジュールのインポート</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">re</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="'\d'は1文字の数字を表す正規表現">'\d'は1文字の数字を表す正規表現<a class="anchor-link" href="#'\d'は1文字の数字を表す正規表現">¶</a></h3><p><code>\d</code>を用いて、あるtextから、電話番号パターンにマッチする部分を検索しましょう。
<code>re.compile()</code>に正規表現パターンを表す文字列を渡すと、Regexオブジェクトが返ります。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">phone_num_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'\d\d\d-\d\d\d\d-\d\d\d\d'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>文字列の前の<code>r</code>はraw文字列を指定し、文字をエスケープせずに簡潔に表現しています。</p>
<h3 id="search()メソッドとgroup()メソッド">search()メソッドとgroup()メソッド<a class="anchor-link" href="#search()メソッドとgroup()メソッド">¶</a></h3><p>Regexオブジェクトの<code>search()</code>メソッドは、渡された文字列の中から正規表現にマッチするパターンが見つかれば、Matchオブジェクトを返します。
Matchオブジェクトには<code>group()</code>メソッドがあり、実際にマッチしたテキストを返します</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">mo</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phone_num_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'私の電話番号は080-1111-22222です。'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'電話番号が見つかりました：'</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">mo</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>電話番号が見つかりました：080-1111-2222
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="'()'を用いたグルーピング">'()'を用いたグルーピング<a class="anchor-link" href="#'()'を用いたグルーピング">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">phone_num_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'(\d\d\d)-(\d\d\d\d-\d\d\d\d)'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">phone_num_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'私の電話番号は080-1000-2000です。'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mo</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mo</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mo</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mo</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">groups</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>080-1000-2000
080
1000-2000
('080', '1000-2000')
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="'|'を使って複数のグループとマッチ">'|'を使って複数のグループとマッチ<a class="anchor-link" href="#'|'を使って複数のグループとマッチ">¶</a></h3><p>例えば<code>r'Batman|Spiderman'</code>という正規表現は、<code>'Batman'</code>or<code>'Spiderman'</code>にマッチします。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">hero_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'Batman|Spiderman'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">hero_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Batman and Yasmizuman'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[6]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'Batman'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>両方ある場合は最初に出現したほうが返ります。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [7]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">mo2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">hero_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'The Spiderman fights Batman and Yasumizuman'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[7]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'Spiderman'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="丸カッコと縦線とを応用">丸カッコと縦線とを応用<a class="anchor-link" href="#丸カッコと縦線とを応用">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">yasumizu_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'Yasumizu(man|woman|hotel)'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">yasumizu_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Yasumizuman lost his way back to Yasumizuhotel.'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[8]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'man'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="'?'を用いた任意のマッチ">'?'を用いた任意のマッチ<a class="anchor-link" href="#'?'を用いた任意のマッチ">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [9]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">yasu_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'Yasumizu(wo)?man'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">yasu_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'The Adveture of Yasumizuman'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[9]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'Yasumizuman'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [10]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">mo2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">yasu_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'The Adveture of Yasumizuwoman'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[10]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'Yasumizuwoman'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="'*'を用いた0回以上のマッチ">'*'を用いた0回以上のマッチ<a class="anchor-link" href="#'*'を用いた0回以上のマッチ">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [11]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">yasu_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'Yasu(mi)*zu'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">yasu_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'The Adventure of Yasuzu'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[11]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'Yasuzu'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [12]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">mo2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">yasu_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'The Adventure of Yasumimimimimimimizu'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[12]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'Yasumimimimimimimizu'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="'+'を用いた1回以上のマッチ">'+'を用いた1回以上のマッチ<a class="anchor-link" href="#'+'を用いた1回以上のマッチ">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [13]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">yasu_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'Yasu(mi)+zu'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">yasu_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'The Adventure of Yasumimimimimizu'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[13]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'Yasumimimimimizu'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [14]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">mo2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">yasu_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'The Adventure of Yasuzu'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo2</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="kc">None</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[14]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>True</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="'{}'を用いて繰り返し回数を指定する">'{}'を用いて繰り返し回数を指定する<a class="anchor-link" href="#'{}'を用いて繰り返し回数を指定する">¶</a></h3><p>例：<code>(Ha){3} = (HaHaHa) , (Ha){3,5} = (HaHaHa|HaHaHaHa|HaHaHaHaHa)</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [15]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ha_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'(Ha){3,5}'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ha_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'HaHaHaHaHa'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[15]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'HaHaHaHaHa'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [16]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">mo2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ha_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Ha'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo2</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="kc">None</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[16]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>True</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="貪欲マッチ：ジャガビーは一番長いものをとる。">貪欲マッチ：ジャガビーは一番長いものをとる。<a class="anchor-link" href="#貪欲マッチ：ジャガビーは一番長いものをとる。">¶</a></h3><p>Pythonの正規表現は、デフォルトでは貪欲マッチです。つまり、複数の可能性があると最も長い方にマッチします。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [17]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">greedy_Ha_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'(Ha){3,5}'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">greedy_Ha_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'HaHaHaHaHaHaHaHaHaHaHa'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[17]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'HaHaHaHaHa'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="非貪欲マッチ：遠慮して一番短いものをとる">非貪欲マッチ：遠慮して一番短いものをとる<a class="anchor-link" href="#非貪欲マッチ：遠慮して一番短いものをとる">¶</a></h3><p>閉じカッコの後に<code>?</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [18]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">nongreedy_Ha_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'(Ha){3,5}?'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">nongreedy_Ha_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'HaHaHaHaHaHaHaHaHaHaHa'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mo2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[18]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'HaHaHa'</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="findall()メソッド">findall()メソッド<a class="anchor-link" href="#findall()メソッド">¶</a></h3><p><code>search()</code>が最初に見つかった文字列を返すのに対し、<code>findall()</code>は見つかったすべての文字列を返します。
<code>findall()</code>はタプルのリストを返すことに注意。</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [19]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">phone_num_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'\d\d\d-\d\d\d\d-\d\d\d\d'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">phone_num_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">findall</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Cell: 415-5555-9999 Work: 212-5555-0000'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[19]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>['415-5555-9999', '212-5555-0000']</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [20]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">phone_num_regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'(\d\d\d)-(\d\d\d\d)-(\d\d\d\d)'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">phone_num_regex</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">findall</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Cell: 415-5555-9999 Work: 212-5555-0000'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[20]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>[('415', '5555', '9999'), ('212', '5555', '0000')]</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>続きはありますが、あまり出しすぎるとネタが無くなるので、今回はここまでにしておきます。
また書きます。</p>
<p>上記の内容をうまく利用して、自分で電子メールアドレスの正規表現を作ってみてもおもしろいと思います。</p>
<h2 id="正規表現について、さらに詳しく">正規表現について、さらに詳しく<a class="anchor-link" href="#正規表現について、さらに詳しく">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li><a href="https://docs.python.jp/3/library/re.html">6.2. re — 正規表現操作 — Python 3.6.3 ドキュメント</a></li>
<li><a href="https://qiita.com/dongri/items/2a0a18e253eb5bf9edba">よく使う正規表現はもうググりたくない！ - Qiita</a></li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>

    mathjaxscript[(window.opera ? "innerHTML" : "text")] =
        "MathJax.Hub.Config({" +

entry.title: 食べログのWebScraping
entry.content: 安水さんに教えてもらい、先週からpythonで遊んでいます。食べログをweb scrapingして大阪市のラーメン屋さんの評価点数とコメント数の相関係数と離散分布図を作成しました。
